sn35.81:1.1: Atha kho sambahula bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu …pe… ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavocum:
sn35.81:1.2: “idha no, bhante, annatitthiya paribbajaka amhe evam pucchanti:
sn35.81:1.4: Evam puttha mayam, bhante, tesam annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam evam byakaroma:
sn35.81:1.5: ‘dukkhassa kho, avuso, parinnattham bhagavati brahmacariyam vussati’ti.
sn35.81:1.6: Kacci mayam, bhante, evam puttha evam byakaramana vuttavadino ceva bhagavato homa, na ca bhagavantam abhutena abbhacikkhama, dhammassa canudhammam byakaroma, na ca koci sahadhammiko vadanuvado garayham thanam agacchati”ti?
sn35.81:2.1: “Taggha tumhe, bhikkhave, evam puttha evam byakaramana vuttavadino ceva me hotha, na ca mam abhutena abbhacikkhatha, dhammassa canudhammam byakarotha, na ca koci sahadhammiko vadanuvado garayham thanam agacchati.
sn35.81:2.2: Dukkhassa hi, bhikkhave, parinnattham mayi brahmacariyam vussati.
sn35.81:2.3: Sace pana vo, bhikkhave, annatitthiya paribbajaka evam puccheyyum:
sn35.81:2.4: ‘katamam pana tam, avuso, dukkham, yassa parinnaya samane gotame brahmacariyam vussati’ti?
sn35.81:2.5: Evam puttha tumhe, bhikkhave, tesam annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam evam byakareyyatha:
sn35.81:2.6: ‘cakkhu kho, avuso, dukkham, tassa parinnaya bhagavati brahmacariyam vussati.
sn35.81:2.8: yampidam cakkhusamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi dukkham.
sn35.81:2.11: yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi dukkham.
sn35.81:2.13: Idam kho tam, avuso, dukkham, tassa parinnaya bhagavati brahmacariyam vussati’ti.
sn35.81:2.14: Evam puttha tumhe, bhikkhave, tesam annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam evam byakareyyatha”ti.
